main event: A sighting of a star-like unidentified flying object in Wild Rice, North Dakota.
interesting points: The object was observed to be blue to fiery brown in color., The sighting lasted for 15 minutes., The object exhibited a fast zig-zag motion., The object's size was noted to be longer than a standard star when first seen., The object disappeared in a manner consistent with astronomical behavior.
sighted object: a star-like object that changed colors and moved quickly
witness description: Mr. & Mrs. Wild Rice, residents of the area
